name: Out of Diskspace
description:
This game is an entry for Epic Megajam2021

Team:

Nguyen Phi Hung

Guide:

Find app space allocation in memory

Use blue download chunk appear on top to install app

If app failed to installed, blue block will 

turn red and cannot be used for install app

However, red block can be deleted to free up diskspace.

Control Guide:

W/A/S/D | Controller Directional/Left Stick      : Bot movement

Q/E   | Left/Right Shoulder Button        : Rotate block

R | Face Button Up            : Push block

C  | Face Button Down           : Pull Block

F | Right Trigger            : Split Block

Spacebar | Left Trigger     : Hold Block

Left Shift | Face Button Left    : Destroy Red Block

Left Control  | Face Button Rigt  : Change Split Position

Escape | Start/Select       : Return to Main Menu

Tool Used:

Unreal Engine 5 

Blender

Third Party Asset Used:

Model:

  • m2-sata-nvme - Sketchfab
  • dark-rock-pro-4 - Sketchfab
  • MSI RTX 3070 Ventus 2x - GrabCad
  • ram-ddr4-gskill-trident-z-rgb - Sketchfab
  • gigabyte-aorus-b450i-pro-wifi-itx - GrabCad
